name: SewerCrusader
description:
A tree needs roots. Sewer is not just a sewer, it's the city's roots. A city without sewer is a tree with no root. You are now working for the city's roots. 

The "Sewer Crusader."

How to play
  • Control : A & D (+ Ctrl to dash)
  • Jump : Space Bar
  • Attack : Left Click
  • Shield : Right Click
  • Switch Weapon : Left-Shift

Credit
  • MOJIRain (Artist)
  • Hengkubpom (Programmer & Gameplay Designer)
  • Kesinew (Artist & Sound Engineer)
RanLubToh9 Team
